channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: New SWP flyposting, 17th November
item.description:
A new batch of Socialist Workers Party posters has appeared on both sides of the underpass

Bin full

item.title: Abandoned silver Audi, 17th November
item.description:
Abandoned Silver coloured Audi saloon car with no visible registration number plates. Been parked in front of no: 110 for weeks. Needs to be removed.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riverdale Road, Plumstead

item.title: Household items dumped, 17th November
item.description:
Household items dumped on the street. Not sure how long it has been there.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped besides blackbins on Bell Street by Daventry Junction, 17th November
item.description:
Large residential waste including a mattress dumped besides the blackbins

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 70, Bell Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Gravel on the road, 17th November
item.description:
A vehicle has deposited gravel on the road outside Sainsburys and down towards the zebra crossing. Wheels cannot grip the road surface properly and the stones are being pushed across both sides of the road and onto the central reservation of the zebra crossing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 308, Erith Road, Barnehurst, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping outside my flat mattress and other items, 17th November
item.description:
On the corner of Tilia Road and Clarence Road abandoned items. A mattress and other unsanitary household waste.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clarence Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights for 3 lampposts are out for months, 17th November
item.description:
Street light pole has been knocked down by vehicle and hasn't been repaired in months. It has only been guarded off and is blocking footpath completely. Another 3 street lights aren't working and need to be repaired urgently for health and safety reasons
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodmill Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Street lighting not working, 17th November
item.description:
The street light of Hoskins Street, just outside Paul Rhodes' bakery/factory is not working. It is very dark after sunset (now 4pm) making the area feel unsafe. Could you please repair the street light. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hoskins Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping mattress, 16th November
item.description:
I was walking my dog in the evening and walked past a mattress that has been dumped towards the entrance to the park. Newly dumped there as it wasn’t there is afternoon. Will likely cause a hazard to passer bys.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Northumberland Heath, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned mattress on walkway/pathway, 16th November
item.description:
Witnessed two females walk up the road and dump a mattress on walkway/pathway which is now going to cause issues for people walking up the pathway and could cause it to fall on a passerby.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trinity School, Northumberland Heath, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley

item.title: Dangerous cracked pavement, 16th November
item.description:
This has been there for 2 weeks. A dangerous trip hazard especially now it is dark in the early evenings. Paving stone is cracked in half.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillview Road, Chislehurst
